item.description:
Hi All,

IL Monticello's is having a singles dance. It's a rented hall for this Dance. The cost is 20 dollars to get in. That includes a Buffet, Desserts, DJ, Dancing, and usually Late Night cookies and coffee. They usually get about 200 people there, and it's a good time.

The time to arrive, is 8 pm. I will put up a balloon for you to find the area we will be in.

This is a formal upscale Dance, so no sneakers or jeans please. (or else you won't get in.) Remember, dress to impress!

Let's try something different.

Once Again, it's Time to Party.

Steve C.

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: PartyExpress goes to IL Monticello's.
